text: Chilandanyo cha achinakunaku pakwanyenga Ayuda walukosyo lwa Nadhir ya kumpitikuchila Muhammadi (ﷺ chili chisawu shetani ndema jawansalile mundu kuti: “Munkanani (Allah).” Basi ndema ja wakanile, (shetani) jwatite: “Chisimu une ndalikangene namwe, unetu ngun'jogopa Allah M’mbuje jwa iwumbe yosope.”
